channel.title: Rune-Lyfe Client V1
channel.description:
This is MY Client, based off of the older delta scape client, i added alot of silabs items. The ip is hidden and currently set to 127.0.0.1, so im going to tell you how to change the ip, and also how to make ur ip un-findable. Okay, first the "How to". THE CHANGING IP. ok open up your client.java, and search this. [CODE]public final Socket method19[/CODE] Then you should see something like this. [CODE] public final Socket method19(int i) throws IOException { return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName("127.0.0.1"), i); }[/CODE] Then Change the "127.0.0.1" to what ever your ip is, and if you host the server, i would leave the "127.0.0.1" for the default ip. Make a copy for your guest on servers. HIDING THE IP. All you do is simple, just delete all .java and leave the class for your guest! Now for the pictures! [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj296/baseballjason053/ScreenShotv1001.jpg[/img] [b][REMOVED IMAGE, CONTAINED FORUM URL][/b] - KIHOMURA. [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj296/baseballjason053/ScreenShotv1003.jpg[/img]
And The UPLOADS! [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/151282524/Rune-Lyfe_Client_v1.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/151282524/Rune-Lyfe_Client_v1.rar.html[/url] uploading uppit and more at the moment THANKS FOR READING! CLIENT CREDITS- 20% to Deltascape. 80% to me! Post Your Comment, please don't spam or flame.

This is MY Client, based off of the older delta scape client, i added alot of silabs items. The ip is hidden and currently set to 127.0.0.1, so im going to tell you how to change the ip, and also how to make ur ip un-findable.
Okay, first the “How to”.
THE CHANGING IP.
ok open up your client.java, and search this.

public final Socket method19

Then you should see something like this.

public final Socket method19(int i) throws IOException { return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName("127.0.0.1"), i); }
Then Change the “127.0.0.1” to what ever your ip is, and if you host the server, i would leave the “127.0.0.1” for the default ip. Make a copy for your guest on servers.
HIDING THE IP.
All you do is simple, just delete all .java and leave the class for your guest!
